name: Trains Completed
tooltip: Tracks the number of times you participated in Train with all orders filled.

name: Meet the Cast
tooltip: Greet all of the non-player characters in Valley View.

name: Explore the Valley
tooltip: Leave your Settlement and venture into the Valley.

name: Fighter
tooltip: Defeat the enemies of Valley View.

name: Scroll Revealer
tooltip: Reveal scrolls at the Ancient Temple.

name: Adventurer
tooltip: Camp in a tent for the first time. Click on the player avatar to pitch a tent.

name: Mariner
tooltip: Obtain the means to travel by water. Purchase a boat at the General Store.

name: Kill the Duke
tooltip: Slay Duke Angelo to avenge the lover of Juliet.

name: Prospero's Orb
tooltip: Collect the orb from the Wizard Prospero, hidden in the Valley.

name: Season Winner
tooltip: Finish in the top 3 players across the Frontier at the end of a season.

name: Season Champion
tooltip: Be the top player across the Frontier at the end of a season.

name: SawFrontierTip
tooltip: [player has seen the frontier view tooltip]
